Package models

Class Prices.SpecialMoviePrices

java.lang.Object
models.Prices.SpecialMoviePrices
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Prices.FourDXMoviesPrices, Prices.ImaxMoviesPrices, Prices.RegularMoviePrices, Prices.ThreeDMoviesPrices
Enclosing class:
Prices
public abstract static class Prices.SpecialMoviePrices extends Object implements Serializable
The SpecialMoviePrices abstract class holds the price attributes for the special movies (3D, 4DX, IMAX).

      The SpecialMoviePrices for assigning custom prices;
      Parameters:
      studentPrice - The price for students
      monWedPrice - The monday to wednesday price
      thuPrice - The thursday price
      fridayB6Price - The friday before 6pm price
      fridayA6Price - The friday after 6pm price
      weekendPrice - The weekedn price
